15460.「いや <pc>だったか……。\n おどろかせて すまなかった。\n だが いい:
No, it's <pc>... I'm sorry to have
frightened you. But you've come to the right
place.

15461.「じつは 村王クリフゲーンさまが\n 帰りの遅い村人を探しに\n 雪山に行ったま:
In fact, Chief Cliffgain went to the snowy
mountains to look for a villager who was late
returning home and never came back.

15462.「ちがったか……。お前は 旅の者だな。\n ふむ。<pc>というのか。:
You are a traveler, aren't you? Hmm. You are
<pc>?

15463.「じつは このランガーオ村の村王である\n クリフゲーンさまが 帰りの遅い村人を:
In fact, Chief Cliffgain of Langao went to the
snowy mountains to look for a villager who was
late returning home and never came back.

15464.「村王は お父さんを 探しにいったの！: The Village King went looking for my father!

15465.「お父さんが帰ってこないのって 私が言ったら\n すぐに連れ戻してくるから お前:
I said, "Daddy's not home yet," and he said,
"I'll bring him right back, and don't
worry, you just wait and see."

15466.「村の者が 雪山から戻らないときに\n 村王が捜索に行くのは よくあることだが\:
It is not uncommon for the village chief to go on a search when villagers do not return from the snowy mountains, but this is the first
time he has returned so late.

15467.「考えたくはないが…… 村王の身に\n 何か あったのかもしれん。すまないが\n:
I hate to think it, but something may have happened to the Village King. I'm sorry, but I need you to go to the snowy mountains to find
the Village King!

15469.「お父さんは 今日は\n ラギ雪原の方に行くって 言ってました。\n 町で売れる:
Dad said he was going to Ragi Snowfield today.
He said he was going to gather materials to
sell in town.

15470.「村王にも そう伝えたから\n そっちの方に行けば\n きっと ふたりに 会える:
I've told the village king that, and I'm sure
you'll find them there!

15471.「ラギ雪原は ランガーオ山地の東端から\n 北へ抜けた所にある 厳しい雪原だ。\:
Ragi Snowfield is a harsh snowfield just north
of the eastern edge of the Langao Mountains.
If you go there, take this with you.

15473.「それは 雪山で体力をうばわれぬよう\n 身体を あたためるための 薬草の一種だ:
It is a kind of medicinal herb that warms the
body so that it does not lose its strength in
snowy mountains.

15474.「もしも 村王や フウミの父親が\n 寒さで弱っていたら それを食べさせてくれ。:
If the Village King or Fuumi's father is weak
from the cold, feed them. I'm counting on you.

15475.「<pc>さん！ お父さんと\n 村王のことを よろしくお願いします！:
<pc>! Please give my regards to my
father and the Village King!

15476.「おおっ 恩に着るぞ……と言いたいところだが\n どうやら 今は 頼まれごとが\:
Oh, I'd say I owe you... but it looks like you
have a lot of favors to do right now...

15477.「無理強いはできんが こちらも急を要する。\n できるなら 手を空けてきて\n:
I can't force you to do anything, but it's
urgent. If you can, I'd like you to come and
do me a favor.

15478.「そ そうか……。\n こうなったら 村王が 無事に戻られることを\n 天に祈る:
Well, well... we'll just have to pray to the
heavens for the Village King's safe return...

15480.「もう一度 頼もう。\n 村王が 帰りの遅い村人を探しに\n 雪山に行ったまま:
I'll ask you again. The village chief went to
the snowy mountains to look for a villager who
was late returning home and never came back.

15481.「村の者が 雪山から戻らないときに\n 村王が捜索に行くのは よくあることだが\:
It is not uncommon for the village chief to go on a search when villagers do not return from the snowy mountains, but this is the first
time he has returned so late.

15482.「考えたくはないが…… 村王の身に\n 何か あったのかもしれん。すまないが\n:
I hate to think it, but something may have happened to the Village King. I'm sorry, but I need you to go to the snowy mountains to find
the Village King!

15483.「おお <pc>！\n 村王と フウミの父親は 見つかったのか！？:
Oh <pc>! Did you find the Village
King and Fuumi's father!

15484.「そうか。まだか……。\n いや 急かして すまない。: I see. I'm sorry for rushing you.

15485.「村王と フウミの父親は\n ラギ雪原の方に 向かったと思われる。\n そちらを:
The village king and Fuumi's father are
probably headed for Ragi Snowfield. Please
focus your search there.

15486.「頼りは お前だけなのだ。\n よろしく頼むぞ。: You are my only hope. I'm counting on you.

15487.「<pc>さん！ お父さんと\n 村王のことを よろしくお願いします！:
<pc>! Please give my regards to my
father and the Village King!

15491.「……目を覚ませ クーガ。\n どうやら 神さまは まだ\n わしらを 死なせて:
Wake up, Cougar. Apparently, God hasn't let us
die yet.

15492.「いかんな……。寒さで 意識を\n 失ってしまっている。何か 身体を\n あたた:
I don't like it... I'm losing consciousness
from the cold. I wish I had something to warm
me up...

15493.村王クリフゲーンに\nヌーク草を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you give Nook Grass to Chief Cliffgain,
the Village King?<yesno><close>

15494.「お前は 村から来たのだろう？\n だったら ランガーオ村の者から\n 何か あ:
You are from the village, aren't you? If so,
have you received anything from the people of
Langao Village?

15495.<pc>は 村王クリフゲーンに\nヌーク草を 渡した。:
<pc> gave Nook Grass to Chief
Cliffgain, the village king.

15496.「おお ヌーク草を持ってきてくれたか！\n よし！ これさえあれば！:
Oh, you brought Nook Grass! Yes! If only I had
some of this!

15500.「さすが 効果絶大だな。\n よし わしも ひとクチいただこう。:
As expected, it is very effective. All right,
I'll have a mouthful, too.

15501.「いやあ ありがとうございました。\n おかげで 血が沸き立つくらい\n 全身ポ:
Well, thank you very much. Thanks to you, my
whole body is so warm that my blood boils.
With this, I can make it back to the village!

15502.「村王も ありがとうございました。\n もし 村王が岩陰に運んでくれなかったら\:
Thank you also, Village King. If the Village King hadn't carried me to the shade of the rock, I would be freezing to death right
now...

15503.「ガハハ！ わしに 礼はいらん！\n わしも 寒さに体力をうばわれて\n ここま:
Gahaha! Don't thank me! I, too, was too weak
from the cold to carry you all the way here.

15504.「ヌーク草も持たずに 雪山に来るとは\n わしも うかつだったわ。\n いや そ:
It was stupid of me to come to the snowy
mountains without Nook Grass. No, it was more
like...

15505.「この わしが 雪山で動けなくなる日が\n 来るとはな……。:
I never thought the day would come when I
would be stuck in the snowy mountains...

15506.「いやいや。そんなこと言ってる場合ではない。\n ヌーク草の 効果が切れる前に\:
No, no. No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,
no, no, no, no, no. We must get back to the
village before the Nook Grass wears off!

15507.「ガハハ！ <pc>よ！\n お前には 礼をせねばな！\n 村に戻ったら わしの:
Gahaha! <pc>! I owe you a debt of
gratitude! When you get back to the village,
come to my house!

15508.「おっ <pc> 戻ったか！\n ガハハ！ 待っていたぞ！:
Whoa <pc> you're back! Gahaha! We've
been waiting for you!

15509.「お前が 村に来てくれて 助かった！\n もし お前が いなかったらと思うと\n:
Thank God you came to the village! I shudder
to think what it would have been like if you
hadn't! Gahahaha!

15510.「<pc>さん ありがとうございました。\n おかげで お父さんも 村王も\n:
<pc> Thank you very much. Thanks to
you, my father and the Village King returned
safely.

15511.「採取の帰りに 急に吹雪が強くなりまして……。\n 雪山には 慣れているつもりだ:
On the way back from the collection, a blizzard suddenly intensified... I thought I was used to snowy mountains, but I was totally
unprepared for this.

15512.「まあ みんな無事で なによりだ！\n そうだ ギュラン。忘れないうちに\n あ:
Well, I'm glad you're all safe! That's right,
Guran. Give that to <pc> before I
forget.

15513.「これは 私と村王からの 心ばかりの お礼だ。\n 受け取ってくれ。:
This is a small token of my appreciation from
me and the Village King. Please accept it.

15514.「では 私たちは これで。: Well, we'll leave you to it.

15515.「<pc>さん！\n 今度 うちにも 遊びにきてくださいね！:
<pc>! You should come visit us
sometime!

15516.「今 この村の 若くて強い連中は\n みんな 修行の旅に出ている。その間くらいは:
Right now, all the young and strong men in this village are on a training trip. I thought I would protect the village for the time
being, but...

15517.「……わしも トシをとったということか。\n どうやら もう 若い頃と\n 同じ:
I must be getting old. It seems I am not as
good as I was when I was young.

15518.「そういえば 村王。\n 村王が 村を離れられている間に\n こんな手紙が 届い:
Oh, by the way, my dear King. While you were
away from the village, you received this
letter.

15519.「おお。わしにか？\n わしに手紙など めずらしいな。:
Oh. For me? It is rare for me to receive
letters.

15521.「きっと…… 強くなったのだろうな。: I'm sure... he must have gotten stronger.
